}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] D1 @1.0GHz :Single-core ''XuanTie'' C906 ([https://occ.t-head.cn/vendor/cpu/index?id=3817197695983423488 RISC-V]) *Storage: 256MB Serial (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE LAN port *USB: 1x USB Type-C (OTG) port *Power Source: USB Female Type-C :or edge connector
==Links of Interest== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/DongshanPi_Nezha_STU ''DongshanPi Nezha STU'' on '''Linux-SunXi''' wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/03/25/dongshan-nezha-stu-devkit-features-allwinner-d1-risc-v-som-sbc/ ''Dongshan Nezha STU devkit features Allwinner D1 RISC-V'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/allwinner-d1-risc-v-soc-shows-up-on-new-nezha-stu-dev-kit-and-devterm-handheld/ ''Allwinner D1 RISC-V SoC shows up on new Nezha STU dev kit'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
